info.title: Barong
info.description: RESTful AdminAPI for barong OAuth server

get.description: Returns array of users with pending or replaced documents as paginated collection

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: When true endpoint returns full information about users

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch.If set, only records FROM the time will be retrieved.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch.If set, only records BEFORE the time will be retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users per page (defaults to 100, maximum is 100).

200.description: Returns array of users with pending or replaced documents as paginated collection

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: When true endpoint returns full information about users

parameters.name: ordering

parameters.description: Name of the field, which result will be ordered by.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: label key. [a-z0-9_-]+ should be used. Min - 3, max - 255 characters.

parameters.name: expire_time
parameters.description: link will be active for (Time.now + expire_time in following range)

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: In combination with expire_time gives full controll over token expiration

parameters.description: Any additional key: value pairs in json string format

state.description: Profile state: drafted, submitted, verified, rejected

key.description: Label key. [a-z0-9_-]+ should be used. Min - 3, max - 255 characters.

value.description: Label value. [A-Za-z0-9_-] should be used. Min - 3, max - 255 characters.

description.description: Label desc: json string with any additional information

doc_type.description: Document type: passport, driver license, utility bill, identity card, institutional, address, residental

data.description: Any additional data json key:value pairs

action.description: Permission action: accept (allow access (drop access), audit (record activity)

verb.description: Permission verb: put, post, delete, get

API_V2_Entities_Permission.description: Returns array of permissions as paginated collection

topic.description: Defined topic (session, adjustments) or general by default

action.description: API action: POST => 'create', PUT => 'update', GET => 'read', DELETE => 'delete', PATCH => 'update' or system if there is no match of HTTP method

result.description: Status of API response: succeed, failed, denied

data.description: Parameters which was sent to specific API endpoint
